mapper.update:
update toa_sys_work_overtime set
NAME=#{name},
START_TIME=#{startTime},
END_TIME=#{endTime},
WORK_HOUR=#{workHour},
WORK_CONTENT=#{workContent},
REMARK=#{remark},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE=#{createDate},
MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
